title: Numbers & Counting
description: This lesson introduces pupils to numbers from 1 to 20. They will learn to count objects, recognize numbers, and write them correctly. The aim is to build strong foundational number sense.

title: Addition Basics
description: Pupils will learn how to add small numbers using objects, pictures, and number lines. They will understand the concept of 'putting together' to form a total.

title: Subtraction Basics
description: This topic introduces subtraction as 'taking away'. Pupils will use real objects and drawings to practice simple subtraction facts.
